## ChampionSkin class

A representation of a champion's skin (visual modification).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChampionSkin 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(champ, data, meraki)](./shieldbow.championskin._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ChampionSkin</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [availability](./shieldbow.championskin.availability.md) |  | string | The availability of this skin - Available or Legacy. |
|  [centeredSplashArt](./shieldbow.championskin.centeredsplashart.md) |  | string | The splash art for the skin zoomed in on the champion to make it centered. |
|  [champ](./shieldbow.championskin.champ.md) |  | [Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md) | The champion this skin belongs to. |
|  [chromas](./shieldbow.championskin.chromas.md) |  | { name: string; id: number; image: string; }\[\] | Whether the skin has chromas or not. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.championskin.id.md) |  | number | The numerical ID of this skin. |
|  [internalId](./shieldbow.championskin.internalid.md) |  | string | The ID this skin is identified by internally (the game). |
|  [isBase](./shieldbow.championskin.isbase.md) |  | boolean | Whether the skin is the base skin. |
|  [loadingScreen](./shieldbow.championskin.loadingscreen.md) |  | string | The loading screen image. |
|  [lore](./shieldbow.championskin.lore.md) |  | string | The lore of the champion in the world of this skin line. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.championskin.name.md) |  | string | The name of the skin displayed in game. U |
|  [price](./shieldbow.championskin.price.md) |  | { rp: number; sale: number; } | The in-game price of the skin. |
|  [rarity](./shieldbow.championskin.rarity.md) |  | string | How rare is this skin - 'Epic', 'Legendary', etc. |
|  [splashArt](./shieldbow.championskin.splashart.md) |  | string | The default splash art for the skin. |
|  [vintageLoadingScreen?](./shieldbow.championskin.vintageloadingscreen.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The loading screen image with skin border (if available). |
